author: Phil McCausland
title: Cuomo says state is preparing for 'battle' at apex of the curve
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Tuesday that the state is working to get ahead of the coronavirus because "you don't win by playing catch up."
content:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Tuesday his state is working to get ahead of the coronavirus because "you don't win by playing catch up."
The state's number of cases has grown to 75,795, including 1,550 deaths up from 1,218 deaths the previous day. Cuomo war… [+6295 chars]
